html:
{{mode}}
Purchase Invoice

{{doc.company}}
{%if doc.company_address %} {%set add = frappe.get_doc("Address",doc.company_address)%} {{add.address_line1}}
{{add.address_line2}},{{add.city}}
GSTIN/UIN: {{add.gstin}}
State Name : {{add.state}}
Pincode : {{add.pincode}}
Email ID : {{add.email_id or ""}}

{% endif %}

Consignee (Ship to)
{{doc.naming_supplier}}
{%if doc.shipping_address_name %} {%set ship_add = frappe.get_doc("Address",{"name":doc.shipping_address_name})%} {{ship_add.address_line1}}
{{ship_add.address_line2}},{{ship_add.city}}
GSTIN/UIN: {{ship_add.gstin}}
State Name : {{ship_add.state}}, Pincode : {{ship_add.pincode}} {% else %} {%if doc.customer_address %} {%set dis_add = frappe.get_doc("Address",{"name":doc.billing_address})%} {{dis_add.address_line1 or ""}},
{{dis_add.address_line2 or ""}}, {{dis_add.city or ""}}
GSTIN/UIN: {{dis_add.gstin or ""}}
State Name : {{dis_add.state or ""}}, Pincode : {{dis_add.pincode or ""}}

{% endif %} {% endif %}

Buyer (Bill to)
{{doc.customer}}
{%if doc.customer_address %} {%set dis_add = frappe.get_doc("Address",{"name":doc.billing_address})%} {{dis_add.address_line1 or ""}},
{{dis_add.address_line2 or ""}}, {{dis_add.city or ""}}
GSTIN/UIN: {{dis_add.gstin or ""}}
State Name : {{dis_add.state or ""}}, Pincode : {{dis_add.pincode or ""}} {% else %} {% if doc.shipping_address_name %} {%set ship_add = frappe.get_doc("Address",{"name":doc.shipping_address_name})%} {{ship_add.address_line1}}
{{ship_add.address_line2}},{{ship_add.city}}
GSTIN/UIN: {{ship_add.gstin}}
State Name : {{ship_add.state}}, Pincode : {{ship_add.pincode}}

{% endif %} {% endif %}
name: Purchase Order Print Format
